channel.title: Xenorune 530 help
channel.description:

item.title: Xenorune 530 help
item.dc:creator: @nickenator nickenator
item.description:
@nickenator wrote:

hax xex:

easy fix anywhere in the files that it says need a no-arg constructed put in public NPC() { } or in this case if it is items it would be public Items() { }

Thanks, but it looks like itâ€™s already set up that way.

[code]package com.xeno.model;

/**

  • Represents a single item.
  • Immutable.
  • @author Graham

*/
public class Item {

private int itemId;
private int itemAmount;
private transient ItemDefinition itemDefinition;

public Item(int id, int amount) {
	this.itemId = id;
	this.itemAmount = amount;
	this.itemDefinition = ItemDefinition.forId(id);
}

public ItemDefinition getDefinition() {
	return itemDefinition;
}

public Object readResolve() {
	this.itemDefinition = ItemDefinition.forId(itemId);
	return this;
}

public int getItemId() {
	return itemId;
}

public void setItemId(int itemId) {
	this.itemId = itemId;
	this.itemDefinition = ItemDefinition.forId(itemId);
}

public int getItemAmount() {
	return itemAmount;
}

public void setItemAmount(int amount) {
	this.itemAmount = amount;
}

}
[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Xenorune 530 help
item.dc:creator: @hax_xex hax xex
item.description:
@hax_xex wrote:

easy fix anywhere in the files that it says need a no-arg constructed put in public NPC() { } or in this case if it is items it would be public Items() { }

Read full topic
